classDiagram
    Customer "1" --> "*" Ticket
    Student "1" --> "1..*" Course
    Galaxy --> "many" Star : Contains
---
+----------+    +---------+    +--------+     
| Customer |    | Student |    | Galaxy |     
+----------+    +---------+    +--------+     
    1 |            1 |             |         
      |              |          Contains      
      v *            v 1..*        v many       
 +--------+     +--------+      +------+         
 | Ticket |     | Course |      | Star |         
 +--------+     +--------+      +------+
